description.en:
Chun Hyang is a mermaid who leads a peaceful life. Everything changes when her parents are captured by humans. Her only hope: to go to earth to take revenge on the humans and find her lost family. Her only mission: to become a human hunter!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28246)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58863)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Chunhyang-sous-abysses)
description.fr:
Chun Hyang est une sirène qui mène une vie paisible. Tout bascule lorsque ses parents sont capturés par des humains. Son seul espoir : Aller sur terre pour se venger des humains et retrouver sa famille perdue. Sa seule mission : Devenir chasseuse d'humains !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28246)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58863)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Chunhyang-sous-abysses)
description.ja:
人魚である主人公はいつものように平和な日々を送っていた。しかしある日、両親が人間に釣りあげられてしまい、突如として全てが一変する。 人間への復讐を誓った主人公は両親を取り戻すために地上へと向かうが・・・。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28246)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58863)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Chunhyang-sous-abysses)
description.ko:
바닷속 인어인 주인공은 여느 때와 다름없이 평화로운 나날을 보내고 있었지만, 그 일상은 인간들이 하는 낚시에 부모님들이 잡혀가면서 모두 무너지게 된다. 인간들에게 복수를 다짐한 주인공은 부모님을 되찾겠다는 결심을 하고 지상으로 나가게 되는데…

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28246)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58863)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Chunhyang-sous-abysses)
description.zh:
深海里的人鱼原本过着平凡普通的生活，但是人类的捕捞抓走了人鱼的亲人。昔日的美好平静毁于一旦，这令人鱼痛不欲生。为了寻亲复仇，人鱼来到陆地…

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28246)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58863)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Chunhyang-sous-abysses)
